name: project-harvest-root
description: Root script runner for Project Harvest

scripts.test: cd Backend/scrapers && pytest && cd ../.. && cd Backend && npm test
scripts.scrape: cd Backend/scrapers && python3 nutrition_scraper.py --testing --days 1 && python3 load_to_db.py && cd ../.. && cd Backend && python3 export_to_json.py
scripts.scrape:full: cd Backend/scrapers && python3 nutrition_scraper.py --days 7 && python3 load_to_db.py && cd ../.. && cd Backend && python3 export_to_json.py
scripts.scrape:today: cd Backend/scrapers && python3 nutrition_scraper.py --days 1 && python3 load_to_db.py && cd ../.. && cd Backend && python3 export_to_json.py
